Plot: A docudrama about the sisters Anne & Alet who killed several women with poison in the late 18th century. They were finally caught and judged to death by beheading.
Title: Anne & Alet
Writer: Stephan A. Hergel, Vegard Landsverk (script editor), Torgrim Sørnes
Actors: Anne Windsland, Rikke Lydersen Simonsen, Helge Jordal, Cecilie F. Johnsen
